src/serial/zsc-src/init.f File Reference

Detailed Description

Initialization step for the D2Q5/D2Q9 Zheng-Shu-Chew multiphase LBM. Smeared interface initialized using equilibrium order parameter function for each drop defined in the input (in the range [R-IntWidth,R+IntWidth]). The distribution functions f and g are initialized to their equilibrium value for zero velocity.
